content.webTitle: College days: Walé Adeyemi, fashion designer

fields.headline: College days
fields.bodyText: Name Walé Adeyemi. Age August 28, 1971. Occupation Hip British fashion designer. Clients include the Beckhams, Usher and Beyoncé. His label, B Side, makes its street launch in August. College Kent Institute of Art & Design. Course HND in fashion design. Attended 1992-1994. A tutor recalls "Walé was very popular. He did an awful lot for the college, running fashion shows and getting involved with group projects. He'd gather information from his friends about what they wanted. He wasn't too happy on projects that weren't related to his interests. Music was his influence - in those days we had bass rooms and he was always in there playing loud hip-hop. He became a window-dresser when he left and did some retail work for Head Over Heels in Covent Garden. He set up a market stall in Camden and went into Urban Outfitters in 1997."
